methods.doc:
Disassociates actors from the layer system, generally used before deleting the Actors

methods.name: EditorMapChange
methods.doc: Delegate handler for FEditorDelegates::MapChange. It internally calls LayersChanged.Broadcast.

methods.name: EditorRefreshLayerBrowser
methods.doc: Delegate handler for FEditorDelegates::RefreshLayerBrowser. It internally calls UpdateAllActorsVisibility to refresh the actors of each layer.
